line_text: Call here my varlet; I'll unarm again:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Why should I war without the walls of Troy,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: That find such cruel battle here within?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Each Trojan that is master of his heart,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Let him to field; Troilus, alas! hath none.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Will this gear ne'er be mended?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: The Greeks are strong and skilful to their strength,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Fierce to their skill and to their fierceness valiant;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: But I am weaker than a woman's tear,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Tamer than sleep, fonder than ignorance,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Less valiant than the virgin in the night
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: And skilless as unpractised infancy.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Well, I have told you enough of this: for my part,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: I'll not meddle nor make no further. He that will
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Have I not tarried?

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Ay, the grinding; but you must tarry

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: the bolting.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Have I not tarried?

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Ay, the bolting, but you must tarry the leavening.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Still have I tarried.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Doth lesser blench at sufferance than I do.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: At Priam's royal table do I sit;

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: And when fair Cressid comes into my thoughts,--

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: As wedged with a sigh, would rive in twain,

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: I have, as when the sun doth light a storm,

line_text: Buried this sigh in wrinkle of a smile:

line_text: But sorrow, that is couch'd in seeming gladness,

line_text: will not dispraise your sister Cassandra's wit, but--

line_text: O Pandarus! I tell thee, Pandarus,--

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: When I do tell thee, there my hopes lie drown'd,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Reply not in how many fathoms deep

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: They lie indrench'd. I tell thee I am mad
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: In Cressid's love: thou answer'st 'she is fair;'
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Pour'st in the open ulcer of my heart
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Her eyes, her hair, her cheek, her gait, her voice,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Handlest in thy discourse, O, that her hand,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: In whose comparison all whites are ink,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Writing their own reproach, to whose soft seizure
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: The cygnet's down is harsh and spirit of sense

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Hard as the palm of ploughman: this thou tell'st me,

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: As true thou tell'st me, when I say I love her;

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: But, saying thus, instead of oil and balm,

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: The knife that made it.

line_text: I speak no more than truth.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: found it, and there an end.

line_text: When with your blood you daily paint her thus.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

scene_title: SCENE II.  The Same. A street.

line_text: Whose height commands as subject all the vale,

scene_title: SCENE II.  The Same. A street.

line_text: To see the battle. Hector, whose patience

line_text: Is, as a virtue, fix'd, to-day was moved:

scene_title: SCENE II.  The Same. A street.

scene_title: SCENE II.  The Same. A street.

scene_title: SCENE II.  The Same. A street.

line_text: My mind is troubled, like a fountain stirr'd;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.

line_text: And I myself see not the bottom of it.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.

line_text: Would the fountain of your mind were clear again,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.

line_text: that I might water an ass at it! I had rather be a
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.

line_text: tick in a sheep than such a valiant ignorance.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  The Grecian camp. Before Achilles' tent.

line_text: See, ho! who is that there?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: It is the Lord AEneas.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Is the prince there in person?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Had I so good occasion to lie long
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: As you, prince Paris, nothing but heavenly business
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Should rob my bed-mate of my company.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: That's my mind too. Good morrow, Lord AEneas.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: A valiant Greek, AEneas,--take his hand,--
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Witness the process of your speech, wherein
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: You told how Diomed, a whole week by days,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Did haunt you in the field.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Health to you, valiant sir,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: During all question of the gentle truce;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: But when I meet you arm'd, as black defiance
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: As heart can think or courage execute.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: The one and other Diomed embraces.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Our bloods are now in calm; and, so long, health!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: But when contention and occasion meet,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: By Jove, I'll play the hunter for thy life
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: With all my force, pursuit and policy.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: And thou shalt hunt a lion, that will fly
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: With his face backward. In humane gentleness,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Welcome to Troy! now, by Anchises' life,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Welcome, indeed! By Venus' hand I swear,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: No man alive can love in such a sort
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: The thing he means to kill more excellently.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: We sympathize: Jove, let AEneas live,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: If to my sword his fate be not the glory,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: A thousand complete courses of the sun!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: But, in mine emulous honour, let him die,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: With every joint a wound, and that to-morrow!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: We know each other well.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: We do; and long to know each other worse.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: This is the most despiteful gentle greeting,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: The noblest hateful love, that e'er I heard of.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: What business, lord, so early?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: I was sent for to the king; but why, I know not.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: His purpose meets you: 'twas to bring this Greek
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: To Calchas' house, and there to render him,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: For the enfreed Antenor, the fair Cressid:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Let's have your company, or, if you please,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Haste there before us: I constantly do think--
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Or rather, call my thought a certain knowledge--
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: My brother Troilus lodges there to-night:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Rouse him and give him note of our approach.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: With the whole quality wherefore: I fear
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: We shall be much unwelcome.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: That I assure you:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Troilus had rather Troy were borne to Greece
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Than Cressid borne from Troy.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: There is no help;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: The bitter disposition of the time
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Will have it so. On, lord; we'll follow you.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Good morrow, all.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: And tell me, noble Diomed, faith, tell me true,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Even in the soul of sound good-fellowship,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Who, in your thoughts, merits fair Helen best,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Myself or Menelaus?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Both alike:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: He merits well to have her, that doth seek her,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Not making any scruple of her soilure,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: With such a hell of pain and world of charge,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: And you as well to keep her, that defend her,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Not palating the taste of her dishonour,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: With such a costly loss of wealth and friends:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: He, like a puling cuckold, would drink up
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: The lees and dregs of a flat tamed piece;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: You, like a lecher, out of whorish loins
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Are pleased to breed out your inheritors:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Both merits poised, each weighs nor less nor more;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: But he as he, the heavier for a whore.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: You are too bitter to your countrywoman.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: She's bitter to her country: hear me, Paris:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: For every false drop in her bawdy veins
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: A Grecian's life hath sunk; for every scruple
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Of her contaminated carrion weight,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: A Trojan hath been slain: since she could speak,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: She hath not given so many good words breath
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: As for her Greeks and Trojans suffer'd death.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Fair Diomed, you do as chapmen do,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Dispraise the thing that you desire to buy:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: But we in silence hold this virtue well,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: We'll but commend what we intend to sell.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Here lies our way.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE I.  Troy. A street.

line_text: Dear, trouble not yourself: the morn is cold.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Then, sweet my lord, I'll call mine uncle down;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: He shall unbolt the gates.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Trouble him not;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: To bed, to bed: sleep kill those pretty eyes,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: And give as soft attachment to thy senses
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: As infants' empty of all thought!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Good morrow, then.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: I prithee now, to bed.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Are you a-weary of me?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: O Cressida! but that the busy day,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Waked by the lark, hath roused the ribald crows,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: And dreaming night will hide our joys no longer,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: I would not from thee.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Night hath been too brief.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Beshrew the witch! with venomous wights she stays
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: As tediously as hell, but flies the grasps of love
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: With wings more momentary-swift than thought.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: You will catch cold, and curse me.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Prithee, tarry:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: You men will never tarry.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: O foolish Cressid! I might have still held off,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: And then you would have tarried. Hark!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: there's one up.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: It is your uncle.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: A pestilence on him! now will he be mocking:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: I shall have such a life!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: How now, how now! how go maidenheads? Here, you
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: maid! where's my cousin Cressid?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Go hang yourself, you naughty mocking uncle!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: You bring me to do, and then you flout me too.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: To do what? to do what? let her say
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: what: what have I brought you to do?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Come, come, beshrew your heart! you'll ne'er be good,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Nor suffer others.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Ha! ha! Alas, poor wretch! ah, poor capocchia!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: hast not slept to-night? would he not, a naughty
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: man, let it sleep? a bugbear take him!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Did not I tell you? Would he were knock'd i' the head!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Who's that at door? good uncle, go and see.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: My lord, come you again into my chamber:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: You smile and mock me, as if I meant naughtily.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Ha, ha!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Come, you are deceived, I think of no such thing.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: How earnestly they knock! Pray you, come in:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: I would not for half Troy have you seen here.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Who's there? what's the matter? will you beat
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: down the door? How now! what's the matter?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Good morrow, lord, good morrow.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Who's there? my Lord AEneas! By my troth,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: I knew you not: what news with you so early?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Is not Prince Troilus here?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Here! what should he do here?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Come, he is here, my lord; do not deny him:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: It doth import him much to speak with me.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Is he here, say you? 'tis more than I know, I'll
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: be sworn: for my own part, I came in late. What
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: should he do here?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: Who!--nay, then: come, come, you'll do him wrong
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: ere you're ware: you'll be so true to him, to be
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: false to him: do not you know of him, but yet go
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: fetch him hither; go.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: How now! what's the matter?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: My lord, I scarce have leisure to salute you,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: My matter is so rash: there is at hand
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Court of Pandarus' house.

line_text: But I can tell that in each grace of these
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: There lurks a still and dumb-discoursive devil
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: That tempts most cunningly: but be not tempted.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Do you think I will?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: No.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: But something may be done that we will not:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: And sometimes we are devils to ourselves,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: When we will tempt the frailty of our powers,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Presuming on their changeful potency.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Come, kiss; and let us part.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Good brother, come you hither;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: And bring AEneas and the Grecian with you.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: My lord, will you be true?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Who, I? alas, it is my vice, my fault:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Whiles others fish with craft for great opinion,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: I with great truth catch mere simplicity;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Whilst some with cunning gild their copper crowns,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: With truth and plainness I do wear mine bare.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Fear not my truth: the moral of my wit
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Is 'plain and true;' there's all the reach of it.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Welcome, Sir Diomed! here is the lady
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Which for Antenor we deliver you:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: At the port, lord, I'll give her to thy hand,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: And by the way possess thee what she is.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Entreat her fair; and, by my soul, fair Greek,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: If e'er thou stand at mercy of my sword,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Name Cressida and thy life shall be as safe
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: As Priam is in Ilion.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Fair Lady Cressid,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: So please you, save the thanks this prince expects:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: The lustre in your eye, heaven in your cheek,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Pleads your fair usage; and to Diomed
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: You shall be mistress, and command him wholly.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Grecian, thou dost not use me courteously,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: To shame the zeal of my petition to thee
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: In praising her: I tell thee, lord of Greece,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: She is as far high-soaring o'er thy praises
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: As thou unworthy to be call'd her servant.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: I charge thee use her well, even for my charge;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: For, by the dreadful Pluto, if thou dost not,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Though the great bulk Achilles be thy guard,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: I'll cut thy throat.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: O, be not moved, Prince Troilus:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Let me be privileged by my place and message,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: To be a speaker free; when I am hence
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: I'll answer to my lust: and know you, lord,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: I'll nothing do on charge: to her own worth
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: She shall be prized; but that you say 'be't so,'
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: I'll speak it in my spirit and honour, 'no.'
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Come, to the port. I'll tell thee, Diomed,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: This brave shall oft make thee to hide thy head.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Lady, give me your hand, and, as we walk,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: To our own selves bend we our needful talk.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Hark! Hector's trumpet.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: How have we spent this morning!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: The prince must think me tardy and remiss,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: That sore to ride before him to the field.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: 'Tis Troilus' fault: come, come, to field with him.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Let us make ready straight.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Yea, with a bridegroom's fresh alacrity,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Let us address to tend on Hector's heels:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: The glory of our Troy doth this day lie
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: On his fair worth and single chivalry.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE IV.  The same. Pandarus' house.

line_text: Here art thou in appointment fresh and fair,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Anticipating time with starting courage.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Give with thy trumpet a loud note to Troy,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Thou dreadful Ajax; that the appalled air
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: May pierce the head of the great combatant
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And hale him hither.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Thou, trumpet, there's my purse.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Now crack thy lungs, and split thy brazen pipe:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Blow, villain, till thy sphered bias cheek
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Outswell the colic of puff'd Aquilon:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Come, stretch thy chest and let thy eyes spout blood;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Thou blow'st for Hector.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: No trumpet answers.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: 'Tis but early days.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Is not yond Diomed, with Calchas' daughter?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: 'Tis he, I ken the manner of his gait;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: He rises on the toe: that spirit of his
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: In aspiration lifts him from the earth.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Is this the Lady Cressid?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Even she.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Most dearly welcome to the Greeks, sweet lady.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Our general doth salute you with a kiss.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Yet is the kindness but particular;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: 'Twere better she were kiss'd in general.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And very courtly counsel: I'll begin.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: So much for Nestor.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I'll take what winter from your lips, fair lady:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Achilles bids you welcome.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I had good argument for kissing once.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: But that's no argument for kissing now;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: For this popp'd Paris in his hardiment,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And parted thus you and your argument.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: O deadly gall, and theme of all our scorns!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: For which we lose our heads to gild his horns.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: The first was Menelaus' kiss; this, mine:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Patroclus kisses you.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: O, this is trim!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Paris and I kiss evermore for him.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I'll have my kiss, sir. Lady, by your leave.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: In kissing, do you render or receive?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Both take and give.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I'll make my match to live,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: The kiss you take is better than you give;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Therefore no kiss.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I'll give you boot, I'll give you three for one.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: You're an odd man; give even or give none.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: An odd man, lady! every man is odd.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: No, Paris is not; for you know 'tis true,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: That you are odd, and he is even with you.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: You fillip me o' the head.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: No, I'll be sworn.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: It were no match, your nail against his horn.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: May I, sweet lady, beg a kiss of you?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: You may.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I do desire it.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Why, beg, then.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Why then for Venus' sake, give me a kiss,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: When Helen is a maid again, and his.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I am your debtor, claim it when 'tis due.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Never's my day, and then a kiss of you.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Lady, a word: I'll bring you to your father.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: A woman of quick sense.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Fie, fie upon her!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: There's language in her eye, her cheek, her lip,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Nay, her foot speaks; her wanton spirits look out
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: At every joint and motive of her body.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: O, these encounterers, so glib of tongue,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: That give accosting welcome ere it comes,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And wide unclasp the tables of their thoughts
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: To every ticklish reader! set them down
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: For sluttish spoils of opportunity
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And daughters of the game.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: The Trojans' trumpet.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Yonder comes the troop.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Hail, all you state of Greece! what shall be done
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: To him that victory commands? or do you purpose
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: A victor shall be known? will you the knights
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Shall to the edge of all extremity
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Pursue each other, or shall be divided
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: By any voice or order of the field?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Hector bade ask.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Which way would Hector have it?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: He cares not; he'll obey conditions.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: 'Tis done like Hector; but securely done,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: A little proudly, and great deal misprizing
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: The knight opposed.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: If not Achilles, sir,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: What is your name?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: If not Achilles, nothing.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Therefore Achilles: but, whate'er, know this:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: In the extremity of great and little,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Valour and pride excel themselves in Hector;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: The one almost as infinite as all,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: The other blank as nothing. Weigh him well,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And that which looks like pride is courtesy.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: This Ajax is half made of Hector's blood:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: In love whereof, half Hector stays at home;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Half heart, half hand, half Hector comes to seek
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: This blended knight, half Trojan and half Greek.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: A maiden battle, then? O, I perceive you.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Here is Sir Diomed. Go, gentle knight,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Stand by our Ajax: as you and Lord AEneas
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Consent upon the order of their fight,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: So be it; either to the uttermost,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Or else a breath: the combatants being kin
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Half stints their strife before their strokes begin.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: They are opposed already.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: What Trojan is that same that looks so heavy?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: The youngest son of Priam, a true knight,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Not yet mature, yet matchless, firm of word,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Speaking in deeds and deedless in his tongue;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Not soon provoked nor being provoked soon calm'd:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: His heart and hand both open and both free;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: For what he has he gives, what thinks he shows;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Yet gives he not till judgment guide his bounty,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Nor dignifies an impure thought with breath;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Manly as Hector, but more dangerous;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: For Hector in his blaze of wrath subscribes
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: To tender objects, but he in heat of action
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Is more vindicative than jealous love:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: They call him Troilus, and on him erect
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: A second hope, as fairly built as Hector.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Thus says AEneas; one that knows the youth
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Even to his inches, and with private soul
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Did in great Ilion thus translate him to me.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: They are in action.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Now, Ajax, hold thine own!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Hector, thou sleep'st;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Awake thee!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: His blows are well disposed: there, Ajax!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: You must no more.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Princes, enough, so please you.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I am not warm yet; let us fight again.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: As Hector pleases.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Why, then will I no more:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Thou art, great lord, my father's sister's son,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: A cousin-german to great Priam's seed;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: The obligation of our blood forbids
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: A gory emulation 'twixt us twain:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Were thy commixtion Greek and Trojan so
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: That thou couldst say 'This hand is Grecian all,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And this is Trojan; the sinews of this leg
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: All Greek, and this all Troy; my mother's blood
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Runs on the dexter cheek, and this sinister
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Bounds in my father's;' by Jove multipotent,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Thou shouldst not bear from me a Greekish member
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Wherein my sword had not impressure made
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Of our rank feud: but the just gods gainsay
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: That any drop thou borrow'dst from thy mother,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: My sacred aunt, should by my mortal sword
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Be drain'd! Let me embrace thee, Ajax:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: By him that thunders, thou hast lusty arms;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Hector would have them fall upon him thus:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Cousin, all honour to thee!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I thank thee, Hector
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Thou art too gentle and too free a man:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I came to kill thee, cousin, and bear hence
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: A great addition earned in thy death.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Not Neoptolemus so mirable,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: On whose bright crest Fame with her loud'st Oyes
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Cries 'This is he,' could promise to himself
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: A thought of added honour torn from Hector.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: There is expectance here from both the sides,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: What further you will do.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: We'll answer it;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: The issue is embracement: Ajax, farewell.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: If I might in entreaties find success--
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: As seld I have the chance--I would desire
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: My famous cousin to our Grecian tents.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: 'Tis Agamemnon's wish, and great Achilles
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Doth long to see unarm'd the valiant Hector.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: AEneas, call my brother Troilus to me,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And signify this loving interview
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: To the expecters of our Trojan part;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Desire them home. Give me thy hand, my cousin;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I will go eat with thee and see your knights.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Great Agamemnon comes to meet us here.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: The worthiest of them tell me name by name;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: But for Achilles, mine own searching eyes
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Shall find him by his large and portly size.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Worthy of arms! as welcome as to one
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: That would be rid of such an enemy;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: But that's no welcome: understand more clear,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: What's past and what's to come is strew'd with husks
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And formless ruin of oblivion;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: But in this extant moment, faith and troth,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Strain'd purely from all hollow bias-drawing,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Bids thee, with most divine integrity,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: From heart of very heart, great Hector, welcome.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I thank thee, most imperious Agamemnon.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: less to you.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Let me confirm my princely brother's greeting:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: You brace of warlike brothers, welcome hither.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Who must we answer?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: The noble Menelaus.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: O, you, my lord? by Mars his gauntlet, thanks!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Mock not, that I affect the untraded oath;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Your quondam wife swears still by Venus' glove:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: She's well, but bade me not commend her to you.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Name her not now, sir; she's a deadly theme.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: O, pardon; I offend.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I have, thou gallant Trojan, seen thee oft
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Labouring for destiny make cruel way
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Through ranks of Greekish youth, and I have seen thee,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: As hot as Perseus, spur thy Phrygian steed,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Despising many forfeits and subduements,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: When thou hast hung thy advanced sword i' the air,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Not letting it decline on the declined,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: That I have said to some my standers by
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: 'Lo, Jupiter is yonder, dealing life!'
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And I have seen thee pause and take thy breath,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: When that a ring of Greeks have hemm'd thee in,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Like an Olympian wrestling: this have I seen;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: But this thy countenance, still lock'd in steel,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I never saw till now. I knew thy grandsire,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And once fought with him: he was a soldier good;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: But, by great Mars, the captain of us all,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Never saw like thee. Let an old man embrace thee;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And, worthy warrior, welcome to our tents.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: 'Tis the old Nestor.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Let me embrace thee, good old chronicle,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: That hast so long walk'd hand in hand with time:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Most reverend Nestor, I am glad to clasp thee.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I would my arms could match thee in contention,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: As they contend with thee in courtesy.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I would they could.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Ha!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: By this white beard, I'ld fight with thee to-morrow.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Well, welcome, welcome! I have seen the time.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I wonder now how yonder city stands
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: When we have here her base and pillar by us.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I know your favour, Lord Ulysses, well.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Ah, sir, there's many a Greek and Trojan dead,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Since first I saw yourself and Diomed
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: In Ilion, on your Greekish embassy.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Sir, I foretold you then what would ensue:

play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida

line_text: And that old common arbitrator, Time,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida

line_text: Will one day end it.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: So to him we leave it.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Most gentle and most valiant Hector, welcome:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: After the general, I beseech you next
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: To feast with me and see me at my tent.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I shall forestall thee, Lord Ulysses, thou!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Now, Hector, I have fed mine eyes on thee;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I have with exact view perused thee, Hector,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: And quoted joint by joint.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Is this Achilles?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: I am Achilles.
