scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Behold thy fill.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida

line_text: Nay, I have done already.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: Thou art too brief: I will the second time,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: As I would buy thee, view thee limb by limb.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

line_text: O, like a book of sport thou'lt read me o'er;

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

scene_title: SCENE V.  The Grecian camp. Lists set out.

scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Whose was it?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: By all Diana's waiting-women yond,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: And by herself, I will not tell you whose.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: To-morrow will I wear it on my helm,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: And grieve his spirit that dares not challenge it.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Wert thou the devil, and worest it on thy horn,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: It should be challenged.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Well, well, 'tis done, 'tis past: and yet it is not;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: I will not keep my word.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Why, then, farewell;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Thou never shalt mock Diomed again.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: You shall not go: one cannot speak a word,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: But it straight starts you.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: I do not like this fooling.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Nor I, by Pluto: but that that likes not you pleases me best.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: What, shall I come? the hour?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Ay, come:--O Jove!--do come:--I shall be plagued.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Farewell till then.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Good night: I prithee, come.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Troilus, farewell! one eye yet looks on thee
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: But with my heart the other eye doth see.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Ah, poor our sex! this fault in us I find,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: The error of our eye directs our mind:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: What error leads must err; O, then conclude
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Minds sway'd by eyes are full of turpitude.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: A proof of strength she could not publish more,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Unless she said ' My mind is now turn'd whore.'
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: All's done, my lord.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: It is.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Why stay we, then?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: To make a recordation to my soul
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Of every syllable that here was spoke.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: But if I tell how these two did co-act,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Shall I not lie in publishing a truth?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Sith yet there is a credence in my heart,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: An esperance so obstinately strong,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: That doth invert the attest of eyes and ears,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: As if those organs had deceptious functions,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Created only to calumniate.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Was Cressid here?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: I cannot conjure, Trojan.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: She was not, sure.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Most sure she was.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Why, my negation hath no taste of madness.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Nor mine, my lord: Cressid was here but now.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Let it not be believed for womanhood!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Think, we had mothers; do not give advantage
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: To stubborn critics, apt, without a theme,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: For depravation, to square the general sex
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: By Cressid's rule: rather think this not Cressid.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: What hath she done, prince, that can soil our mothers?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Nothing at all, unless that this were she.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Will he swagger himself out on's own eyes?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: This she? no, this is Diomed's Cressida:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: If beauty have a soul, this is not she;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: If souls guide vows, if vows be sanctimonies,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: If sanctimony be the gods' delight,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: If there be rule in unity itself,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: This is not she. O madness of discourse,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: That cause sets up with and against itself!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Bi-fold authority! where reason can revolt
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Without perdition, and loss assume all reason
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Without revolt: this is, and is not, Cressid.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Within my soul there doth conduce a fight
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Of this strange nature that a thing inseparate
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Divides more wider than the sky and earth,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: And yet the spacious breadth of this division
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Admits no orifex for a point as subtle
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: As Ariachne's broken woof to enter.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Instance, O instance! strong as Pluto's gates;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Cressid is mine, tied with the bonds of heaven:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Instance, O instance! strong as heaven itself;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: The bonds of heaven are slipp'd, dissolved, and loosed;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: And with another knot, five-finger-tied,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: The fractions of her faith, orts of her love,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: The fragments, scraps, the bits and greasy relics
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Of her o'er-eaten faith, are bound to Diomed.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: May worthy Troilus be half attach'd
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: With that which here his passion doth express?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Ay, Greek; and that shall be divulged well
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: In characters as red as Mars his heart
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Inflamed with Venus: never did young man fancy
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: With so eternal and so fix'd a soul.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Hark, Greek: as much as I do Cressid love,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: So much by weight hate I her Diomed:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: That sleeve is mine that he'll bear on his helm;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Were it a casque composed by Vulcan's skill,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: My sword should bite it: not the dreadful spout
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Which shipmen do the hurricano call,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Constringed in mass by the almighty sun,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Shall dizzy with more clamour Neptune's ear
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: In his descent than shall my prompted sword
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Falling on Diomed.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: He'll tickle it for his concupy.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: O Cressid! O false Cressid! false, false, false!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Let all untruths stand by thy stained name,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: And they'll seem glorious.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: O, contain yourself
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Your passion draws ears hither.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: I have been seeking you this hour, my lord:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Hector, by this, is arming him in Troy;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Ajax, your guard, stays to conduct you home.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Have with you, prince. My courteous lord, adieu.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Farewell, revolted fair! and, Diomed,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Stand fast, and wear a castle on thy head!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: I'll bring you to the gates.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Accept distracted thanks.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Would I could meet that rogue Diomed! I would
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: croak like a raven; I would bode, I would bode.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Patroclus will give me any thing for the
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: intelligence of this whore: the parrot will not
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: do more for an almond than he for a commodious drab.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: Lechery, lechery; still, wars and lechery; nothing
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: else holds fashion: a burning devil take them!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE II.  The same. Before Calchas' tent.

line_text: When was my lord so much ungently temper'd,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: To stop his ears against admonishment?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Unarm, unarm, and do not fight to-day.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: You train me to offend you; get you in:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: By all the everlasting gods, I'll go!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: My dreams will, sure, prove ominous to the day.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: No more, I say.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Where is my brother Hector?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Here, sister; arm'd, and bloody in intent.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Consort with me in loud and dear petition,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Pursue we him on knees; for I have dream'd
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Of bloody turbulence, and this whole night
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Hath nothing been but shapes and forms of slaughter.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: O, 'tis true.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Ho! bid my trumpet sound!
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: No notes of sally, for the heavens, sweet brother.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Be gone, I say: the gods have heard me swear.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: The gods are deaf to hot and peevish vows:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: They are polluted offerings, more abhorr'd
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Than spotted livers in the sacrifice.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: O, be persuaded! do not count it holy
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: To hurt by being just: it is as lawful,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: For we would give much, to use violent thefts,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: And rob in the behalf of charity.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: It is the purpose that makes strong the vow;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: But vows to every purpose must not hold:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Unarm, sweet Hector.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Hold you still, I say;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Mine honour keeps the weather of my fate:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Lie every man holds dear; but the brave man
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Holds honour far more precious-dear than life.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: How now, young man! mean'st thou to fight to-day?
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Cassandra, call my father to persuade.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: No, faith, young Troilus; doff thy harness, youth;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: I am to-day i' the vein of chivalry:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: Let grow thy sinews till their knots be strong,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE III.  Troy. Before Priam's palace.

line_text: And tempt not yet the brushes of the war.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida

scene_title: SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.

line_text: Your eyes, half out, weep out at Pandar's fall;
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.

line_text: Or if you cannot weep, yet give some groans,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.

line_text: Though not for me, yet for your aching bones.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.

line_text: Brethren and sisters of the hold-door trade,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.

line_text: Some two months hence my will shall here be made:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.

line_text: It should be now, but that my fear is this,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.

line_text: Some galled goose of Winchester would hiss:
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.

line_text: Till then I'll sweat and seek about for eases,
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.

line_text: And at that time bequeathe you my diseases.
play_title_long: The History of Troilus and Cressida
scene_title: SCENE X.  Another part of the plains.
